sub_title:
Technology & Innovation Manager, self-employed.
After a 40-year successful career in the energy industry and academia, I would like to
contribute to challenging and purposeful innovation and sustainability projects.
summary:
Energetic and internationally-oriented professional with profound experience in industry, innovation and academia. I have a positive and goal-oriented attitude, working towards results that make a difference, beat expectations and often are original. I cooperate with a talented and ambitious team that inspires and motivates, or work autonomously when required. I invest in personal development, including leadership and digitalisation.

After a 40-year successful career in the energy industry and academia, I would like to contribute to challenging and purposeful projects with a innovation and sustainability character.

Married with two children.

Personal characteristics: vital, analytical, creative, autonomous, out-of-the-box thinking, flexible, goal-oriented, confident, resilient.
